de.dimensionv.java.libraries.common.utilities.file.filefilters

Class FileFileFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.dimensionv.java.libraries.common.utilities.file.filefilters.AbstractFileFilter
      • de.dimensionv.java.libraries.common.utilities.file.filefilters.FileFileFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FileFilter

    public class FileFileFilter
extends AbstractFileFilter
    A FileFilter that allows directories only.

    Depending on how it's initialized, it can also show hidden directories. The default behavior is to not show hidden directories.

    Since:
    API 1.3.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Volkmar Seifert <vs@DimensionV.de>

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class de.dimensionv.java.libraries.common.utilities.file.filefilters.AbstractFileFilter

        showHidden

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileFileFilter()
      Default constructor that initializes the DirectoryFileFilter with it's default behavior, meaning hidden directories will not be shown.
      FileFileFilter(boolean includeHiddenDirectories)
      Constructor that initializes the DirectoryFileFilter with the behavior defined by the parameter showHidden.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileFileFilter

        public FileFileFilter()
        Default constructor that initializes the DirectoryFileFilter with it's default behavior, meaning hidden directories will not be shown.
        Since:
        Class 1.0, API 1.3.0

      • FileFileFilter

        public FileFileFilter(boolean includeHiddenDirectories)

        Constructor that initializes the DirectoryFileFilter with the behavior defined by the parameter showHidden.

        • true will enable the display of hidden directories.
        • false will enable the default behavior of not showing hidden directories.
        Parameters:
        includeHiddenDirectories - Defines whether to show hidden directories or not.
        Since:
        Class 1.0, API 1.3.0
